message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section, which typically includes transactions related to long-term assets.

Within this section, I find the line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 1446972.73. This represents the cash payments made to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets), which are long-term assets.

This is the value I need to extract as per the task description.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1446972.73'} }
```
